results.title: Bill's story
results.creator_credit: Lorraine Ermacora, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Lorraine Ermacora’s father-in-law Bill, an immigrant to Australia, stayed with her family he was prompted by a radio program on the first World War to relate his stories of his youth in Italy. He was instrumental in creating a family tradition of community involvement.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lorraine Ermacora, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: When Lorraine Ermacora’s father-in-law Bill, an immigrant to Australia, stayed with her family he was prompted by a radio program on the first World War to relate his stories of his youth in Italy. He was instrumental in creating a family tradition of community involvement.

results.title: Train the trainer : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description: Nine members of the general public in Melbourne tell their stories. These stories resonate deeply with the participants and, ultimately, are an expression of the creator’s identity.

results.title: The Will to live
results.creator_credit: Val Colbert, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Fragile at birth and not meant to live, Val Colbert’s mother went the extra step to keep her alive. This story is dedicated to Colbert’s mum’s tenacity and eternal strength.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Val Colbert, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: The Luddite's tale
results.creator_credit: Myfanwy Thompson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Myfawny Thompson is perplexed by technology, especially the need to text to communicate. After helping her mother move house, Thomspon starts to realise what a wonderful gift technology can be.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Myfanwy Thompson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Who's that girl?
results.creator_credit: Sarah Sneddon, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Sarah Sneddon delves back into the wonderfully bizarre world of her childhood, with its tutus, false eyelashes, hair nets, exams, glitz and glamour.

results.title: Train the trainer : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description: These seven stories are a culmination of a Digital Storytelling ‘Train the trainer’ workshop, held at ACMI in April 2008. The stories are of a personal nature and are centred around an important part of the participant’s lives.
results.description: These seven stories are a culmination of a Digital Storytelling ‘Train the trainer’ workshop, held at ACMI in April 2008. The stories are of a personal nature and are centred around an important part of the participant’s lives.

results.title: [The Working women's centre]
results.creator_credit: Laura Butterworth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: As the Working Women’s Centre in South Australia faces budget cuts, Laura Butterworth reflects on the history of the centre, the stories of the women workers and the battles fought and won.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Laura Butterworth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: As the Working Women’s Centre in South Australia faces budget cuts, Laura Butterworth reflects on the history of the centre, the stories of the women workers and the battles fought and won.
